extendedInfo.description: A simple and easy game! Remember Colours is a game that will test your brain and see how much you can remember!, the aim of the game is to remember the colours which are generated by the computer and touch them in order once it is your turn.Leader bored:  Want to be 1s on the ranking bored then get downloading as this game has online leader bored to save your score online! so the whole world can see and try to beat you!! :D this game is really fun and recommended for kids and adults!Powered by AndEngine and Openfeint.
